autotransform.input package

Submodules

autotransform.input.base module

The base class and associated classes for Input components.

class autotransform.input.base.Input(params: autotransform.input.base.TParams)

Bases: Generic[autotransform.input.base.TParams], abc.ABC

The base for Input components. Used by AutoTransform to get Items that represent potentially transformable units for a Schema. Usually returns files but any Item can be returned as long as Schema components work with it.

_params

The paramaters that control operation of the Input. Should be defined using a TypedDict in subclasses.

Type

TParams

bundle() → autotransform.input.base.InputBundle

Generates a JSON encodable bundle. If a component’s params are not JSON encodable this method should be overridden to provide an encodable version.

Returns

The encodable bundle.

Return type

InputBundle

abstract static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.input.base.Input

Produces an instance of the component from decoded params. Implementations should assert that the data provided matches expected types and is valid.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

Returns

An instance of the Input.

Return type

Input

abstract get_items() → Sequence[autotransform.item.base.Item]

Get a list of Items to be used by the transformation based on the Input criteria. Usually returns FileItems.

Returns

The eligible Items for transformation.

Return type

Sequence[Item]

get_params() → autotransform.input.base.TParams

Gets the paramaters used to set up the Input.

Returns

The paramaters used to set up the Input.

Return type

TParams

abstract static get_type() → autotransform.input.type.InputType

Used to map Input components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Input.

Return type

InputType

class autotransform.input.base.InputBundle

Bases: TypedDict

A bundled version of the Input object used for JSON encoding.

params: Mapping[str, Any]
type: autotransform.input.type.InputType

autotransform.input.directory module

The implementation for the DirectoryInput.

class autotransform.input.directory.DirectoryInput(params: autotransform.input.directory.DirectoryInputParams)

Bases: autotransform.input.base.Input[autotransform.input.directory.DirectoryInputParams]

An Input that lists all files recursively within a provided directory.

_files

A cached list of the files provided by the Input.

Type

List[str]

_params

Contains the directory to walk.

Type

Parameters

Returns

An instance of the DirectoryInput with the provided params.

Return type

DirectoryInput

Gets a list of files recursively contained within the path in the DirectoryInput params.

populate_files(path: pathlib.Path) → None

Populates the file cache for this input. Recursively called to walk all directories under the path.

Parameters

path (Path) – The path from which to populate files.

autotransform.input.factory module

A simple factory for producing Inputs from type and param information.

class autotransform.input.factory.InputFactory

Bases: object

The factory class for Inputs. Maps a type to an Input.

_map

A mapping from InputType to the from_data function of the appropriate Input.

Type

Dict[InputType, Callable[[Mapping[str, Any]], Input]]

static get(bundle: autotransform.input.base.InputBundle) → autotransform.input.base.Input

Simple get method using the _map attribute.

Parameters

bundle (InputBundle) – The bundled Input type and params.

Returns

An instance of the associated Input.

Return type

Input

autotransform.input.gitgrep module

The implementation for the GitGrepInput.

class autotransform.input.gitgrep.GitGrepInput(params: autotransform.input.base.TParams)

Bases: autotransform.input.base.Input[autotransform.input.gitgrep.GitGrepInputParams]

An Input that uses git grep to search a repository for a pattern and returns all files that contain a match of the supplied pattern.

_params

Contains the arguments for doing a git grep search.

Type

GitGrepInputParams

Produces a GitGrepInput from the provided data.

Parameters

Returns

An instance of the GitGrepInput with the provided params

Return type

GitGrepInput

Gets a list of files using git grep that match the supplied pattern.

Returns

The eligible files for transformation.

Return type

autotransform.input.type module

The type of Input, used create a 1:1 mapping.

class autotransform.input.type.InputType(value)

Bases: str, enum.Enum

A simple enum for 1:1 Input to type mapping.

DIRECTORY = 'directory'
GIT_GREP = 'git_grep'

Module contents

Inputs produce a list of Items that are used to make changes to the codebase. These Items can represent anything and only need to be understood by the components of the Schema. Most use cases will return FileItems.
